details: This scheme provides a subsidy to the extent of 75% of the cost for the purchase of an insulated box of at least 50 liters capacity. Only the fisherman engaged in selling and marketing fish, fishing at sea with a canoe, and fishing at sea with a mechanized fishing vessel with up to 6-cylinder engines are eligible to apply to this scheme.
benefits: For the Beneficiary Engaged in Selling/Marketing Fish: One insulated box of 50 liters capacity will be entitled to a subsidy to the extent of 75% of the cost limited to ₹ 1,500/-.

For the Beneficiary Engaged in Fishing at Sea With a Canoe: One insulated box of 100 liters and one box of 220 liters capacity and subsidy to the extent of 75% of the cost limited to ₹ 7,000/- respectively.

For the Beneficiary Engaged in Fishing at Sea With a Mechanized Fishing Vessel Upto 6 Cylinder Engine: One insulated box of 220 liters and one insulated box of 400 liters capacity and subsidy to the extent of 75% of the cost limited to ₹ 15,000/- respectively.
eligibility: The applicant should be a fisherman engaged in selling and marketing fish.
The applicant should be a fisherman engaged in fishing at sea with a canoe.
The applicant should be a fisherman engaged in fishing at sea with a mechanized fishing vessel with up to 6-cylinder engines.
application_process: The interested applicant should take print of the prescribed format of the application form.

In the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph (signed across, if required), and attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required).

Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to the concerned authority at the Department of Fisheries, Dayanand Bandodkar Marg, Patto Colony, Panaji Goa - 403 521, or to the official posted at BDO Office/Sub-Offices of the Department of Fisheries.
documents_required: For 400 & 220 Litres Capacity Insulated Boxes for Fishing Vessels: Copy of VRC (Vessel Registration Certificate) of Fishing Vessel, Latest copy of Updated Fishing License/Certificate, Latest copy of Updated Net License Book, Copy of Aadhaar Card.

For 100 & 220 Litres Capacity Insulated Boxes for Fishing Canoes: Copy of VRC (Vessel Registration Certificate) of Fishing Vessel, Latest copy of Updated Fishing License/Certificate, Latest copy of Updated Net License Book, Copy of Aadhaar Card.

For 50 Litres Capacity Insulated Boxes for Active Fish Sellers: Certificate from Village Panchayat/Municipality indicating that the applicant is actively engaged in the retail sale of fish, Copy of Aadhaar Card.
